In addition, I practice mindfulness and meditation to help me to manage my stress and anxiety. I also prioritize self-care, making sure to get enough rest, eat well, and engage in physical activity to help me to maintain my energy and focus.

Overall, while I do experience moments of nervousness, I am committed to facing them with courage and determination, and to using them as opportunities for growth and learning.
